question: Kenneth collects garbage from 4 different apartment complexes. The first three have 400 apartments each and the last one is 20% bigger than the other three combined. He collects garbage 5 times a week from each place and he gets paid £0.4 per collection for each apartment. How much money does he make in a week?
answer:
The first three complexes have 3*400=<<3*400=1200>>1200 apartments
Number 4 has 1200*0.2=<<1200*0.2=240>>240 more apartments than those three combined.
So in total, it has 1200+240=<<1200+240=1440>>1440 apartments.
So in total, he goes to 1440+1200=<<1440+1200=2640>>2640 apartments each time
That means he visits 2640*5=<<2640*5=13,200>>13,200 apartments every week
So he makes 13,200*£0.4=£<<13,200*0.4=5280>>5280 every week
#### 5280
